name: Man of Steal
description:
Story Plot: After an accident, you find out that you can see through walls and clothes as well as reading minds. One day, your ex-girlfriend calls you and asks for help. Her sister needs a job and a place to live. Still having some feelings for her, you accept to let her sister live with you until she can find a place. But you're in a relationship right now, and it seems that your girlfriend isn't so happy about it.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:
  • Super-Hero (Romance Route).
  • Super-Villain Domination (Harem Route).
  • Super-Villain Sharing (Sharing Route).
  • Super-Loser (NTR - Netorare Route).

Man of Steal is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings.
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys with your superpowers.
  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.
  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:
  • Pregnancy is optional. When the game reaches the final stage, there will be choices for you to decide to impregnate the women or not.
  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Man of Steal (Nymphs).

Since Man of Steal is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:
  • v0.13 (released on Feb 19, 2024): 80% of the expected price.
  • v0.15: 90% of the expected price.
  • v0.17: 100% of the expected price.
  • v1.0: 100% of the expected price.

With the current discount (20%), the price of v0.13 (the current release) is only 64% of the expected price (36% discount in total).

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy Man of Steal, the cheaper it is for you!

Man of Steal is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge), so it contains a lot of erotic scenes. The current release has 9,962 images (including 211 erotic animations). Depending on how you play, the game length will be around 2-3 hours.

Thank you for playing Man of Steal.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!
